name: Lawrence E. BROWN, Jr. d/b/a Jose's Liquor Store v. RHODE ISLAND DEPARTMENT OF BUSINESS REGULATION et al.
name_abbreviation: Brown v. Rhode Island Department of Business Regulation

parties: Lawrence E. BROWN, Jr. d/b/a Jose’s Liquor Store v. RHODE ISLAND DEPARTMENT OF BUSINESS REGULATION et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari and motion for stay are denied.
SHEA, J., did not participate.

attorneys: Stone, Clifton & Clifton, Walter R. Stone, Providence, for petitioner.
Gerald G. Norigian, Frank Mastrati, Jr., Asst. City Sols., Providence, for respondents.
casebody.head_matter:
Lawrence E. BROWN, Jr. d/b/a Jose’s Liquor Store v. RHODE ISLAND DEPARTMENT OF BUSINESS REGULATION et al.
No. 81-140-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
March 19, 1981.
Stone, Clifton & Clifton, Walter R. Stone, Providence, for petitioner.
Gerald G. Norigian, Frank Mastrati, Jr., Asst. City Sols., Providence, for respondents.
